web_snippets: Laura Costello. Sustainability at THINKHOUSE & Ireland Lead at Purpose Disruptors. THINKHOUSE Trinity College, Dublin. Ireland.
THINKHOUSE has appointed Laura Costello as Head of Sustainability and Planet Services. The newly created role is a result of increased client demand.
Laura Costello, Strategy Director Purpose & Planet at THINKHOUSE has been named by Forbes Magazine as one of 43 People Changing Advertising for the Climate.
